This tests that navigator.modelContextTesting.registerToolsChangedCallback works correctly.
PASS: Initial tool list correct
INFO: Tools changed callback invoked (count: 1)
PASS: Callback fired after registerTool
PASS: Tool list has 2 tools after registration
INFO: Tools changed callback invoked (count: 2)
PASS: Callback fired after unregisterTool
PASS: Tool list back to 1 tool after unregistration
INFO: Tools changed callback invoked (count: 3)
PASS: Callback fired after provideContext
INFO: Tools changed callback invoked (count: 4)
PASS: Callback fired after clearContext
PASS: Tool list empty after clearContext
